title: Rename CharacterUtils impls Java5 vs Unicode5
description:
spinnoff from LUCENE-5042 

We named the CharacterUtils impls Java5 / Java4 but by now we don't support Java4 neither Java5 so I think it makes sense to rename them maybe to Unicode5CharacterUtils / Unicode4CharacterUtils?

comments.content: I've been using Java4CharUtils for backwards compat. of the ngram filters that used to split in the middle of surrogate pairs although this has nothing to do with Java 4, so I think naming them after the unicode norm makes more sense. +1
comments.author: Adrien Grand
